script: Devi walks confidently toward the visible stage stairs.
Devi places her foot on the first step, ascending step-by-step.
The audience stands and applauds energetically, creating a ceremonial atmosphere.
Devi reaches out and receives the golden Grammy statuette, holding it in her hand.
The camera holds on Devi, proudly standing on stage with the Grammy, basking in the glow of the warm lighting.
caption: A moment of honor and recognition. #GrammyAwards2026
